member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Buttons.SfButton.IconPosition
member.summary: Positions the icon based on the text content in the button and its default value is Left. The possible values are: - Left: The icon will be positioned to the left of the text content. - Right: The icon will be positioned to the right of the text content. - Top: The icon will be positioned to the top of the text content. - Bottom: The icon will be positioned to the bottom of the text content.

member.summary: Makes the Button toggle, when set to true. When you click it, the state changes from normal to active or viceversa.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Blazor.Calendars.CalendarBase`1
member.summary: The Calendar is a graphical user interface component that displays a Gregorian Calendar, and allows a user to select a date.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Calendars.CalendarBase`1.ValueExpression
member.summary: Specifies the expression for defining the value of the bound.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Calendars.CalendarBase`1.Max
member.summary: Specifies a maximum date that is allowed a user can select in the calendar.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Calendars.CalendarBase`1.Min
member.summary: Specifies a minimum date that is allowed a user can select in the calendar.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Calendars.CalendarBase`1.FirstDayOfWeek
member.summary: Sets the calendar's first day of the week. By default, the first day of the week will be based on the current culture.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Calendars.CalendarBase`1.CalendarMode
member.summary: Sets the calendar's type like Gregorian.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Calendars.CalendarBase`1.DayHeaderFormat
member.summary:
Specifies the format of the day that to be displayed in the header. By default, the format is short.
Possible formats are:
Short Sets the short format of day name (like Su ) in day header.
Narrow Sets the single character of day name (like S ) in day header.
Abbreviated Sets the min format of day name (like Sun ) in day header.
Wide Sets the long format of day name (like Sunday ) in day header.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Calendars.CalendarBase`1.Depth
member.summary:
Sets the maximum level of views such as a month, year, and decade in the calendar.
The depth view should be smaller than the start view to restrict its view navigation.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Calendars.CalendarBase`1.EnablePersistence
member.summary: Enable or disable persisting component's state between page reloads. If enabled, the following list of states will be persisted.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Calendars.CalendarBase`1.KeyConfigs
member.summary:
Customizes the key actions in the calendar.
For example, when using a German keyboard, the key actions can be customized using these shortcuts.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Calendars.CalendarBase`1.Start
member.summary: Specifies the initial view of the calendar when it is opened. With the help of this property, the initial view can be changed to the year or decade view.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Calendars.CalendarBase`1.ServerTimezoneOffset
member.summary:
By default, the date value will be processed based on the system time zone.
If you want to process the initial date value using the server time zone then specify the time zone value to the ServerTimezoneOffset property.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Calendars.CalendarBase`1.Locale
member.summary: Specifies the global culture and localization of the calendar.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Calendars.CalendarBase`1.ShowTodayButton
member.summary: Specifies whether the today button will be displayed in the calendar.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Calendars.CalendarBase`1.WeekNumber
member.summary: Specifies whether the week number of the year will be displayed in the calendar.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Calendars.CalendarBase`1.WeekRule
member.summary: Specifies the rule for defining the first week of the year.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Calendars.CalendarBase`1.Value
member.summary: Gets or sets the selected date of the Calendar.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Calendars.CalendarBase`1.ValueChanged
member.summary: Specifies the callback to trigger when the value changes.

member.summary: Invoke the keyboard action handler

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Calendars.SfDatePicker`1.FloatLabelType
member.summary:
Specifies the floating label behavior of the DatePicker that the placeholder text floats above the DatePicker based on the following values.
Possible values are:
Never Never floats the label in the DatePicker when the placeholder is available.
Always The floating label always floats above the DatePicker.
Auto The floating label floats above the DatePicker after focusing it or when enters the value in it.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Calendars.SfDatePicker`1.Format
member.summary:
Specifies the format of the value that to be displayed in component.
By default, the format is based on the culture.
You can set the format to "format:'dd/MM/yyyy hh:mm'".

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Calendars.DateRangePickerModel`1.AllowEdit
member.summary: Specifies a boolean value whether the DateRangePicker allows user to change the value via typing. When set as false, the DateRangePicker allows user to change the value via picker only.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Calendars.DateRangePickerModel`1.CssClass
member.summary: Specifies the CSS class name that can be appended with the root element of the DateRangePicker. One or more custom CSS classes can be added to a DateRangePicker.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Calendars.DateRangePickerModel`1.Depth
member.summary:
Sets the maximum level of view (Month, Year, Decade) in the Calendar.
Depth view should be smaller than the Start view to restrict its view navigation.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Calendars.DateRangePickerModel`1.EnablePersistence
member.summary:
Enable or disable the persisting DateRangePicker's state between the page reloads. If enabled, following list of states will be persisted.
StartDate
EndDate
Value

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Calendars.DateRangePickerModel`1.EnableRtl
member.summary: Enable or disable rendering DateRangePicker in right to left direction.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Calendars.DateRangePickerModel`1.Enabled
member.summary: Specifies a boolean value that indicates whether the DateRangePicker allows the user to interact with it.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Calendars.DateRangePickerModel`1.EndDate
member.summary: Gets or sets the end date of the date range selection.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Calendars.DateRangePickerModel`1.FirstDayOfWeek
member.summary: Sets the calendar's first day of the week. By default, the first day of the week will be based on the current culture.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Calendars.DateRangePickerModel`1.FloatLabelType
member.summary:
Specifies the floating label behavior of the DateRangePicker that the placeholder text floats above the DateRangePicker based on the following values.
Possible values are:
Never Never floats the label in the DateRangePicker when the placeholder is available.
Always The floating label always floats above the DateRangePicker.
Auto The floating label floats above the DateRangePicker after focusing it or when enters the value in it.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Calendars.DateRangePickerModel`1.Format
member.summary:
Specifies the format of the value that to be displayed in DateRangePicker.
By default, the format is based on the culture.
You can set the format to "format:'dd/MM/yyyy hh:mm'".

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Calendars.DateRangePickerModel`1.HtmlAttributes
member.summary:
You can add the additional input attributes such as disabled, value, and more to the root element.
If you configured both the property and equivalent input attribute, then the DateRangePicker considers the property value.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Calendars.DateRangePickerModel`1.KeyConfigs
member.summary: Customizes the key actions in DateRangePicker. For example, when using German keyboard, the key actions can be customized using these shortcuts.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Calendars.DateRangePickerModel`1.Locale
member.summary: Specifies the global culture and localization of the DateRangePicker.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Calendars.DateRangePickerModel`1.Max
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum date that can be selected in the calendar-popup.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Calendars.DateRangePickerModel`1.MaxDays
member.summary: Specifies the maximum span of days that can be allowed in a date range selection.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Calendars.DateRangePickerModel`1.Min
member.summary: Gets or sets the minimum date that can be selected in the calendar-popup.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Calendars.DateRangePickerModel`1.MinDays
member.summary: Specifies the minimum span of days that can be allowed in date range selection.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Calendars.DateRangePickerModel`1.Placeholder
member.summary: Specifies the text that is shown as a hint or placeholder until the user focuses or enter a value in DateRangePicker. The property is depending on the FloatLabelType property.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Calendars.DateRangePickerModel`1.Presets
member.summary: Set the predefined ranges which let the user pick required range easily in a DateRangePicker.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Calendars.DateRangePickerModel`1.Readonly
member.summary: Specifies a boolean value whether the DateRangePicker allows the user to change the text.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Calendars.DateRangePickerModel`1.Separator
member.summary: Sets or gets the string that used between the start and end date string.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Calendars.DateRangePickerModel`1.ShowClearButton
member.summary: Specifies whether to show or hide the clear icon in DateRangePicker.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Calendars.DateRangePickerModel`1.Start
member.summary: Specifies the initial view of the Calendar when it is opened. With the help of this property, initial view can be changed to year or decade view.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Calendars.DateRangePickerModel`1.StartDate
member.summary: Gets or sets the start date of the date range selection.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Calendars.DateRangePickerModel`1.Value
member.summary: Gets or sets the start and end date of the Calendar.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Calendars.DateRangePickerModel`1.WeekNumber
member.summary: Determines whether the week number of the Calendar is to be displayed or not. The week number is displayed in every week row.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Calendars.DateRangePickerModel`1.Width
member.summary: Specifies the width of the DateRangePicker component.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Calendars.DateRangePickerModel`1.ZIndex
member.summary: specifies the z-index value of the DateRangePicker popup element.

member.summary: Triggers when each day cell of the Calendar is rendered.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Calendars.DateTimePickerModel`1.AllowEdit
member.summary: Specifies a boolean value whether the DateTimePicker allows user to change the value via typing. When set as false, the DateTimePicker allows user to change the value via picker only.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Calendars.DateTimePickerModel`1.CalendarMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the Calendar's Type like gregorian or islamic.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Calendars.DateTimePickerModel`1.CssClass
member.summary: Specifies the CSS class name that can be appended with the root element of the DateTimePicker. One or more custom CSS classes can be added to a DateTimePicker.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Calendars.DateTimePickerModel`1.DayHeaderFormat
member.summary:
Specifies the format of the day that to be displayed in the header. By default, the format is Short.
Possible formats are:
Short Sets the short format of day name (like Su ) in day header.
Narrow Sets the single character of day name (like S ) in day header.
Abbreviated Sets the min format of day name (like Sun ) in day header.
Wide Sets the long format of day name (like Sunday ) in day header.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Calendars.DateTimePickerModel`1.Depth
member.summary:
Sets the maximum level of view (Month, Year, Decade) in the Calendar.
Depth view should be smaller than the Start view to restrict its view navigation.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Calendars.DateTimePickerModel`1.EnablePersistence
member.summary: Enable or disable persisting DateTimePicker's state between page reloads. If enabled, the `Value` state will be persisted.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Calendars.DateTimePickerModel`1.EnableRtl
member.summary: Enable or disable rendering DateTimePicker in right to left direction.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Calendars.DateTimePickerModel`1.Enabled
member.summary: Specifies a boolean value that indicates whether the DateTimePicker allows the user to interact with it.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Calendars.DateTimePickerModel`1.FirstDayOfWeek
member.summary: Sets the calendar's first day of the week. By default, the first day of the week will be based on the current culture.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Calendars.DateTimePickerModel`1.FloatLabelType
member.summary:
Specifies the floating label behavior of the DateTimePicker that the placeholder text floats above the DateTimePicker based on the following values.
Possible values are:
Never Never floats the label in the DateTimePicker when the placeholder is available.
Always The floating label always floats above the DateTimePicker.
Auto The floating label floats above the DateTimePicker after focusing it or when enters the value in it.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Calendars.DateTimePickerModel`1.Format
member.summary:
Specifies the format of the value that to be displayed in DateTimePicker.
By default, the format is based on the culture.
You can set the format to "format:'dd/MM/yyyy hh:mm'".

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Calendars.DateTimePickerModel`1.HtmlAttributes
member.summary:
You can add the additional input attributes such as disabled, value, and more to the root element.
If you configured both the property and equivalent input attribute, then the DateTimePicker considers the property value.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Calendars.DateTimePickerModel`1.KeyConfigs
member.summary: Customizes the key actions in DateTimePicker. For example, when using German keyboard, the key actions can be customized using these shortcuts.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Calendars.DateTimePickerModel`1.Locale
member.summary: Specifies the global culture and localization of the DateTimePicker.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Calendars.DateTimePickerModel`1.Max
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum date that can be selected in the DateTimePicker.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Calendars.DateTimePickerModel`1.Min
member.summary: Gets or sets the minimum date that can be selected in the DateTimePicker.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Calendars.DateTimePickerModel`1.Placeholder
member.summary: Specifies the text that is shown as a hint or placeholder until the user focuses or enter a value in DateTimePicker. The property is depending on the FloatLabelType property.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Calendars.DateTimePickerModel`1.Readonly
member.summary: Specifies a boolean value whether the DateTimePicker allows the user to change the text.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Calendars.DateTimePickerModel`1.ScrollTo
member.summary: Specifies the scroll bar position, if there is no value is selected in the timepicker popup list or the given value is not present in the timepicker popup list.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Calendars.DateTimePickerModel`1.ServerTimezoneOffset
member.summary: By default, the date value will be processed based on system time zone. If you want to process the initial date value using server time zone then specify the time zone value to `ServerTimezoneOffset` property.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Blazor.Adaptors
member.summary:
Specifies the data adaptors
BlazorAdaptor Default. BlazorAdaptor is used to process Enumerable data. It contains methods to process the given collection based on the queries.
ODataAdaptor
OData Adaptor provies ability to consume and manipulate data from OData services.
ODataV4Adaptor
ODatav4 Adaptor provies ability to consume and manipulate data from OData v4 services
WebApiAdaptor
WebApi Adaptor provies ability to consume and manipulate data from WebApi services. This adaptor is targeted to interact with Web API created using OData endpoint, it is extended from ODataAdaptor
UrlAdaptor
URL Adaptor is used when you are required to interact with all kind of remote services to retrieve data.
RemoteSaveAdaptor
Remote Save Adaptor is used for binding JSON data. It interacts with remote services only for CRUD operations.
CustomAdaptor
CustomAdaptor specifies that own data query and manipulation logic has been provided using custom adaptor component extended from DataAdaptor class.
JsonAdaptor
JsonAdaptor is used to process JSON data at the client side. It contains methods to process the given JSON data based on the queries.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Blazor.BaseComponent
member.summary: A Base Component for all the Syncfusion Blazor UI components.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Blazor.DataManager
member.summary: The DataManager is a data management component used for performing data operations in applications. It acts as an abstraction for using local data source - IEnumerable and remote data source - web services returning JSON or oData.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.DataManager.HttpClientInstance
member.summary: Specifies the HttpClient instance to be used by DataManager.
member.remarks: Use HttpClientInstance property to inject named HttpClient into DataManager.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.DataManager.Url
member.summary: Specifies the endpoint URL. DataManager requests this URL when data is needed.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.DataManager.AdaptorInstance
member.summary: Specifies the custom adaptor class type. DataManager uses this type value to instantiate custom adaptor class.
member.remarks: DataManager uses Activator.CreateInstance method to create custom adaptor instance. Injecting services into custom adaptor class, is not supported while using this approach. To inject and use services, provide custom adaptor as a Blazor component by extending DataAdaptor class.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.DataManager.Adaptor
member.summary:
Gets or sets the data adaptor to be used by DataManager.
BlazorAdaptor Default. BlazorAdaptor is used to process Enumerable data. It contains methods to process the given collection based on the queries.
ODataAdaptor
OData Adaptor provies ability to consume and manipulate data from OData services.
ODataV4Adaptor
ODatav4 Adaptor provies ability to consume and manipulate data from OData v4 services
WebApiAdaptor
WebApi Adaptor provies ability to consume and manipulate data from WebApi services. This adaptor is targeted to interact with Web API created using OData endpoint, it is extended from ODataAdaptor
UrlAdaptor
URL Adaptor is used when you are required to interact with all kind of remote services to retrieve data.
RemoteSaveAdaptor
Remote Save Adaptor is used for binding JSON data. It interacts with remote services only for CRUD operations.
CustomAdaptor
CustomAdaptor specifies that own data query and manipulation logic has been provided using custom adaptor component extended from DataAdaptor class.
JsonAdaptor
JsonAdaptor is used to process JSON data at the client side. It contains methods to process the given JSON data based on the queries.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.DataManager.DataAdaptor
member.summary: Holds adaptor instance.

member.summary: Holds dotnet instance.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.DataManager.InsertUrl
member.summary: Specifies the insert URL.
member.remarks: Applicable for remote adaptors. When Insert method is called, request will be made to InsertUrl. If InsertUrl is not provided, Url is used as fallback.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.DataManager.RemoveUrl
member.summary: Specifies the remove URL.
member.remarks: Applicable for remote adaptors. When Remove method is called, request will be made to RemoveUrl. If RemoveUrl is not provided, Url is used as fallback.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.DataManager.UpdateUrl
member.summary: Specifies the update URL.
member.remarks: Applicable for remote adaptors. When Update method is called, request will be made to UpdateUrl. If UpdateUrl is not provided, Url is used as fallback.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.DataManager.CrudUrl
member.summary: Specifies the CRUD URL.
member.remarks: Applicable for remote adaptors. When Insert, Remove or Update method is called, request will be made to CrudUrl. If CrudUrl is not provided, Url is used as fallback.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.DataManager.BatchUrl
member.summary: Specifies the batch url.
member.remarks: Applicable for remote adaptors. When SaveChanges method is called, request will be made to BatchUrl. If BatchUrl is not provided, Url is used as fallback.

summary.para: When AllowFiltering is set to true, show the filter bar (search box) of the component.
The filter action retrieves matched items through the `Filtering` event based on the characters typed in the search TextBox.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfDropDownList`2.CssClass
member.summary: Specifies the CSS class name that can be appended with the root element of the DropDownList. One or more custom CSS classes can be added to a DropDownList.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfDropDownList`2.EnableRtl
member.summary: Enable or disable rendering component in right to left direction.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfDropDownList`2.FilterBarPlaceholder
member.summary: Accepts the value to be displayed as a watermark text on the filter bar.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfDropDownList`2.FloatLabelType
member.summary:
Specifies the floating label behavior of the DropDownList that the placeholder text floats above the DropDownList based on the following values.
Possible values are:
Never Never floats the label in the DropDownList when the placeholder is available.
Always The floating label always floats above the DropDownList.
Auto The floating label floats above the DropDownList after focusing it or when enters the value in it.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfDropDownList`2.FooterTemplate

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfDropDownList`2.HeaderTemplate
member.summary: Accepts the template design and assigns it to the header container of the popup list.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfDropDownList`2.InputAttributes
member.summary:

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfDropDownList`2.EnableVirtualization
member.summary: The Virtual Scrolling feature is used to display a large amount of data that you require without buffering the entire load of a huge database records in the DropDowns, that is, when scrolling, the datamanager request is sent to fetch some amount of data from the server dynamically. To achieve this scenario with DropDowns, set the EnableVirtualization to true.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.DropDownListModel`2.FloatLabelType
member.summary:
Specifies the floating label behavior of the DropDownList that the placeholder text floats above the DropDownList based on the following values.
Possible values are:
Never Never floats the label in the DropDownList when the placeholder is available.
Always The floating label always floats above the DropDownList.
Auto The floating label floats above the DropDownList after focusing it or when enters the value in it.

summary.para: Specifies whether to show or hide the clear button.
When the clear button is clicked, `Value`, `Text`, and `Index` properties are reset to null.

member.summary: Accepts the template design and assigns it to the selected list item in the input element of the component.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.DropDownListModel`2.Width
member.summary:
Specifies the width of the component. By default, the component width sets based on the width of its parent container.
You can also set the width in pixel values.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.DropDownListModel`2.FilterType
member.summary: Determines on which filter type, the component needs to be considered on search action.

summary.para: When set to `false`, consider the `case-sensitive` on performing the search to find suggestions.
By default, consider the casing.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.DropDownListModel`2.IgnoreAccent
member.summary: ignoreAccent set to true, then ignores the diacritic characters or accents when filtering.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.DropDownListModel`2.Query
member.summary: Accepts the external `Query` that execute along with data processing.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.DropDownListModel`2.EnableVirtualization
member.summary: The Virtual Scrolling feature is used to display a large amount of data that you require without buffering the entire load of a huge database records in the DropDowns, that is, when scrolling, the datamanager request is sent to fetch some amount of data from the server dynamically. To achieve this scenario with DropDowns, set the EnableVirtualization to true.

summary.para: To enable the filtering option in this component.
Filter action performs when type in search box and collect the matched item through `Filtering` event.
If searching character does not match, `NoRecordsTemplate` property value will be shown.
By default, the MultiSelect component fires the Change event while focus out the component.
If you want to fires the Change event on every value selection and remove, then disable the ChangeOnBlur property.

This property allows you to render checkbox for group headers and to select all the grouped items at once.
Enable or disable persisting MultiSelect state between page reloads.
If enabled, the `Value` state will be persisted.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.MultiSelectModel`1.FloatLabelType
member.summary:
Specifies the floating label behavior of the MultiSelect that the placeholder text floats above the MultiSelect based on the following values.
Possible values are:
Never Never floats the label in the MultiSelect when the placeholder is available.
Always The floating label always floats above the MultiSelect.
Auto The floating label floats above the MultiSelect after focusing it or when enters the value in it.

member.summary:

Clip Truncates the cell content when it overflows its area.
Ellipsis Displays ellipsis when the cell content overflows its area.
EllipsisWithTooltip Displays ellipsis when the cell content overflows its area also it will display tooltip while hover on ellipsis applied cell.

member.summary:
ColumnQueryMode provides options to retrive data from the datasource.
All It retrives whole data source
Schema Retrives data for all the defined columns in grid from the data source.
ExcludeHidden Retrives data only for visible columns of grid from the data source.

member.summary: Specifies that all columns should be queried from data source.

Box Selects the range of cells within the start and end column indexes that includes in between cells of rows within the range

ResetOnRowClick In ResetOnRowClick mode, on clicking a row it will reset previously selected row and also multiple rows can be selected by using CTRL or SHIFT key.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.ColumnType
member.summary:
Defines the Column Type.
String A string type column.
Number A number type column. Primitive types such as int, int?, floar, double, decimal etc. are consider as number type column.
Boolean A boolean type column.
Date A date type column. Primitive types such as datetime and datetimeoffset are consider as date type column.
DateTime A datetime type column. Primitive types such as datetime and datetimeoffset are consider as date type column.
CheckBox Enables checkbox column for selection purpose. No data operation is assosiated with this column.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.ColumnModel
member.summary: Defines the Column model

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.ColumnModel.AllowEditing
member.summary: If AllowEditing set to false, then it disables editing of a particular column. By default all columns are editable.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.ColumnModel.AllowFiltering
member.summary: If AllowFiltering set to false, then it disables filtering option and filter bar element of a particular column. By default all columns are filterable.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.ColumnModel.AllowGrouping
member.summary: If AllowGrouping set to false, then it disables grouping of a particular column. By default all columns are groupable.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.ColumnModel.AllowReordering
member.summary: If AllowReordering set to false, then it disables reorder of a particular column. By default all columns can be reorder.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.ColumnModel.AllowResizing
member.summary: If AllowResizing set to false, it disables resize option of a particular column.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.ColumnModel.AllowSearching
member.summary: If AllowSearching set to false, then it disables Searching of a particular column. By default all columns allow Searching.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.ColumnModel.AllowSorting
member.summary: If AllowSorting set to false, then it disables sorting option of a particular column. By default all columns are sortable.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.ColumnModel.AutoFit
member.summary: If AutoFit set to true, then the particular column content width will be adjusted based on its content in the initial rendering itself. Setting this property as true is equivalent to calling autoFitColumns method in the dataBound event.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.ColumnModel.ClipMode
member.summary: Defines the cell content's overflow mode.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.ColumnModel.Columns
member.summary: Used to render multiple header rows(stacked headers) on the Grid header.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.ColumnModel.Commands
member.summary: commands provides an option to display command buttons in every cell.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.ColumnModel.CustomAttributes
member.summary: The CSS styles and attributes of the content cells of a particular column can be customized.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.ColumnModel.DataSource
member.summary: Defines the column data source which will act as foreign data source.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.ColumnModel.DefaultValue
member.summary: Defines default values for the component when adding a new record to the Grid.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.ColumnModel.DisableHtmlEncode
member.summary: If DisableHtmlEncode is set to true, it encodes the HTML of the header and content cells.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.ColumnModel.DisplayAsCheckBox
member.summary: If DisplayAsCheckBox is set to true, it displays the column value as a check box instead of Boolean value.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.ColumnModel.Edit
member.summary: Defines object to customize default edit cell.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.ColumnModel.EditTemplate
member.summary: Defines the cell edit template that used as editor for a particular column.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.ColumnModel.EditType
member.summary: Defines the type of component for editing.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.ColumnModel.EnableGroupByFormat
member.summary: If EnableGroupByFormat set to true, then it groups the particular column by formatted values. By default no columns are group by format.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.ColumnModel.Field
member.summary: Defines the field name of column which is mapped with mapping name of DataSource. The bounded columns can be sort, filter and group etc., If the field name contains “dot”, then it is considered as complex binding. the first character must be an alphabet and should not contain spaces and special characters.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.ColumnModel.Filter
member.summary: Defines the filter options to customize filtering for the particular column.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.ColumnModel.FilterBarTemplate
member.summary: The FilterBarTemplate is used to add a custom component instead of default input component for filter bar.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.ColumnModel.FilterTemplate
member.summary: Defines the filter template/UI that used as filter for a particular column.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.ColumnModel.ForeignKeyField
member.summary: Defines the mapping column name of the foreign data source. If it is not defined then the columns.field will be considered as mapping column name

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.ColumnModel.ForeignKeyValue
member.summary: Defines the display column name from the foreign data source which will be obtained from comparing local and foreign data

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.ColumnModel.Format
member.summary: It is used to change display value with the given format and does not affect the original data.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.ColumnModel.Formatter
member.summary: Defines the method which is used to achieve custom formatting from an external function. This function triggers before rendering of each cell.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.ColumnModel.HeaderTemplate
member.summary: Defines the column template which is used to add customized element in the column header.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.ColumnModel.HeaderText
member.summary: Defines the header text of column which is used to display in column header. If HeaderText is not defined, then field name value will be assigned to header text.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.ColumnModel.HeaderTextAlign
member.summary: Define the alignment of column header which is used to align the text of column header.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.ColumnModel.HideAtMedia
member.summary: Column visibility can change based on its Media Queries. HideAtMedia accepts only valid Media Queries.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.ColumnModel.Index
member.summary: Gets the unique identifier value of the column. It is used to get the object.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.ColumnModel.IsFrozen
member.summary: You can use this property to freeze selected columns in grid.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.ColumnModel.IsIdentity
member.summary: If IsIdentity is set to true, then this column is considered as identity column.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.ColumnModel.IsPrimaryKey
member.summary: If IsPrimaryKey is set to true, considers this column as the primary key constraint.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.ColumnModel.LockColumn

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.ColumnModel.MinWidth
member.summary: Defines the minimum width of the column in pixels or percentage.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.ColumnModel.ShowColumnMenu

member.summary: Specifies the minheight of the Dialog

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.DialogSettings.AllowDragging
member.summary: Specifies the value whether the dialog component can be dragged by the end-user. The dialog allows a user to drag by selecting the header and dragging it for re-positioning the dialog.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.DialogSettings.ShowCloseIcon
member.summary: Specifies the value that represents whether the close icon can be shown in the dialog’s title section.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.DialogSettings.CloseOnEscape
member.summary: Specifies the Boolean value whether the dialog can be closed on pressing the escape (ESC) key that is used to control the dialog's closing behavior.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.DialogSettings.EnableResize
member.summary: Specifies the value whether the dialog component can be resized by the end-user. If the EnableResize is true, the dialog component creates a grip to resize it in a diagonal direction.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.DialogSettings.CssClass
member.summary: Specifies the CSS class name that can be appended with the root element of the dialog. One or more custom CSS classes can be added to a dialog.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.DialogSettings.Target
member.summary: Specifies the target element in which the dialog should be displayed. The default value is null, which refers to the `Document.body` element.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.DialogSettings.XValue
member.summary: Specifies the offset left value to position the dialog.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.DialogSettings.YValue
member.summary: Specifies the offset top value to position the dialog.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.DialogSettings.AnimationDelay
member.summary: Specifies the delay in milliseconds to start the animation.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.DialogSettings.AnimationDuration
member.summary: Specifies the duration in milliseconds that the animation takes to open or close the dialog.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.DialogSettings.AnimationEffect
member.summary: Specifies the animation name that should be applied on while opening and closing the dialog. If the user sets Fade animation, the dialog will open with the `FadeIn` effect and close with the `FadeOut` effect. The following are the list of animation effects available to configure to the dialog: 1. Fade 2. FadeZoom 3. FlipLeftDown 4. FlipLeftUp 5. FlipRightDown 6. FlipRightUp 7. FlipXDown 8. FlipXUp 9. FlipYLeft 10. FlipYRight 11. SlideBottom 12. SlideLeft 13. SlideRight 14. SlideTop 15. Zoom 16. None

member.summary: If AllowEditing set to false, then it disables editing of a particular column. By default all columns are editable.

member.summary: If AllowAdding set to false, then it disables add operation of a particular column. By default all columns are editable.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridColumn.AllowFiltering
member.summary: If AllowFiltering set to false, then it disables filtering option and filter bar element of a particular column. By default all columns are filterable.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridColumn.AllowGrouping
member.summary: If AllowGrouping set to false, then it disables grouping of a particular column. By default all columns are groupable.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridColumn.AllowReordering
member.summary: If AllowReordering set to false, then it disables reorder of a particular column. By default all columns can be reorder.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridColumn.AllowResizing
member.summary: If AllowResizing set to false, it disables resize option of a particular column.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridColumn.AllowSearching
member.summary: If AllowSearching set to false, then it disables searching of a particular column. By default all columns are searchable.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridColumn.AllowSorting
member.summary: If AllowSorting set to false, then it disables sorting option of a particular column. By default all columns are sortable.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridColumn.AutoFit
member.summary: If AutoFit set to true, then the particular column content width will be adjusted based on its content in the initial rendering itself. Setting this property as true is equivalent to calling AutoFitColumns method in the DataBound event.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridColumn.ClipMode
member.summary:
Defines the cell content's overflow mode. The available modes are
Truncates the cell content when it overflows its area.
Displays ellipsis when the cell content overflows its area.
Displays ellipsis when the cell content overflows its area also it will display tooltip while hover on ellipsis applied cell.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridColumn.Columns
member.summary: Used to render multiple header rows(stacked headers) on the Grid header.

member.summary: Commands provides an option to display command buttons in every cell. Use component to declare command columns.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridColumn.CustomAttributes
member.summary: The CSS styles and attributes of the content cells of a particular column can be customized.

member.summary: Defines the column data source which will act as foreign data source.
member.remarks: List or any IEnumerable type value is accepted as foreign data source. For custom binding or using remote service as foreign data source use component and configure data source using .

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridColumn.DefaultValue

member.remarks: If no default value is provided then the default value of the model property type will be used as initial value.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridColumn.DisableHtmlEncode
member.summary: If DisableHtmlEncode is set to false, it disables the encodes the HTML of the header and content cells.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridColumn.DisplayAsCheckBox
member.summary: If DisplayAsCheckBox is set to true, it displays the column value as a check box instead of Boolean value.

Customizes the default numerictextbox editor.
Customizes the default dropdown editor.
Customizes the default datepicker editor.
Customizes the default checkbox editor.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridColumn.EditTemplate
member.summary: Defines the cell edit template that used as editor for a particular column.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridColumn.EnableGroupByFormat
member.summary: If EnableGroupByFormat set to true, then it groups the particular column by formatted values. By default columns are group by format.

member.summary: Defines the field name of column which is mapped with mapping name of DataSource. The bounded columns can be sort, filter and group etc., If the Field name contains “dot”, then it is considered as complex binding.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridCommandColumn.Type
member.summary:
Define the command button type.
None Default. A command button with no default action. Use this for custom command actions.
Edit A edit command button that edit current record.
Delete A delete command button that delete current record.
Save A save command button that saves the current edited record.
Cancel A cancel command button that cancels the edit state.
member.remarks: To use custom command button, set Type as and use event to perform custom action.

member.summary: If AllowAdding is set to true, new records can be added to the Grid.

member.summary: If AllowDeleting is set to true, existing record can be deleted from the Grid.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridEditSettings.AllowEditOnDblClick
member.summary: If AllowEditOnDblClick is set to false, Grid will not allow editing of a record on double click.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridEditSettings.AllowEditing
member.summary: If AllowEditing is set to true, values can be updated in the existing record.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridEditSettings.AllowNextRowEdit
member.summary: If allowNextRowEdit is set to true, editing is done to next row. By default allowNextRowEdit is set to false.

member.summary: Defines the dialog params to edit.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridEditSettings.FooterTemplate
member.summary: Defines the custom footer for the edit dialog.
member.remarks: The parameters passed to the templates can be accessed using implicit parameter named context. The context is of type TValue of the grid.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridEditSettings.HeaderTemplate
member.summary: Defines the custom header for the edit dialog.
member.remarks: The parameters passed to the templates can be accessed using implicit parameter named context. The context is of type TValue of the grid.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridEditSettings.Mode
member.summary:
Defines the mode to edit. The available editing modes are:
Normal Default. Editing is done in an inline form. Edit form is rendered inline as one of the table rows.
Dialog Editing is done in a Dialog/Pop component.
Batch Enables cell editing. Multiple cells can be edited, added or deleted and saved.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridEditSettings.NewRowPosition
member.summary:
Defines the position of adding a new row. The available position are:
Top Default. Add form is placed at the first row of the grid.
Bottom Add form is placed at the last row of the grid

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridEditSettings.ShowConfirmDialog
member.summary: If ShowConfirmDialog is set to false, confirm dialog does not show when batch changes are saved or discarded.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridEditSettings.ShowDeleteConfirmDialog
member.summary: If ShowDeleteConfirmDialog is set to true, confirm dialog will show delete action. You can also cancel delete command.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridEditSettings.Template
member.summary: Defines the custom content and edit elements for the edit dialog.
member.remarks: The parameters passed to the templates can be accessed using implicit parameter named context. The context is of type TValue of the grid.

member.remarks: The parameters passed to the templates can be accessed using implicit parameter named context. The context is of type .

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridEvents`1.QueryCellInfo
member.summary: Triggered every time a request is made to access cell information, element, or data. This will be triggered before the cell element is appended to the Grid element.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridEvents`1.OnRecordClick
member.summary: Triggers when record is clicked.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridEvents`1.OnRecordDoubleClick
member.summary: Triggers when record is double clicked.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridEvents`1.OnResizeStart
member.summary: Triggers when column resize starts.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridEvents`1.ResizeStopped
member.summary: Triggers when column resize ends.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridEvents`1.RowDataBound
member.summary: Triggered every time a request is made to access row information, element, or data. This will be triggered before the row element is appended to the Grid element.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridEvents`1.RowDeselected
member.summary: Triggers when a selected row is deselected.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridEvents`1.RowDeselecting
member.summary: Triggers before deselecting the selected row.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridEvents`1.OnRowDragStart
member.summary: Triggers when row element's drag(move) starts.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridEvents`1.RowDropped
member.summary: Triggers when row elements are dropped on the target row.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridEvents`1.RowSelected
member.summary: Triggers after a row is selected.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridEvents`1.RowSelecting
member.summary: Triggers before row selection occurs.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridEvents`1.OnToolbarClick
member.summary: Triggers when toolbar item is clicked.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridEvents`1.BeforeOpenColumnChooser
member.summary: Triggers when clicked column chooser.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridEvents`1.OnPdfExport
member.summary: Triggers before Grid data is exported to PDF document.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridEvents`1.PdfQueryCellInfoEvent
member.summary: The PdfQueryCellInfoEvent event is triggered every time a data is entered into a cell of the pdf document. So this event is triggered as many times as the data is entered into a cell.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridEvents`1.PdfHeaderQueryCellInfoEvent
member.summary: The PdfHeaderQueryCellInfoEvent event is triggered every time a data is entered into a header cell of the pdf document.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridEvents`1.PdfAggregateTemplateInfo
member.summary: The PdfAggregateTemplateInfo event is triggered every time a caption/footer/group footer aggregate row created on the pdf document.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridEvents`1.PdfGroupCaptionTemplateInfo
member.summary: The PdfGroupCaptionTemplateInfo event is triggered every time a caption template row created on the pdf document.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridEvents`1.OnExcelExport
member.summary: Triggers before Grid data is exported to Excel/Csv Sheet.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridEvents`1.ExcelAggregateTemplateInfo
member.summary: The ExcelAggregateTemplateInfo event is triggered every time a caption/footer/group footer aggregate row created on the excel sheet.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridEvents`1.ExcelGroupCaptionTemplateInfo
member.summary: The ExcelGroupCaptionTemplateInfo event is triggered every time a caption template row created on the excel sheet.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridEvents`1.ExcelQueryCellInfoEvent
member.summary: The ExcelQueryCellInfoEvent event is triggered every time a data is entered into a cell of the Excel sheet. So this event is triggered as many times as the data is entered into a cell written in the excel sheet.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridEvents`1.ExcelHeaderQueryCellInfoEvent
member.summary: The ExcelHeaderQueryCellInfoEvent event is triggered every time a data is entered into a header cell of the Excel sheet.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridEvents`1.ExportComplete
member.summary: The ExportComplete event is triggered when exporting process was completed.

member.summary: Defines the parent component

member.summary: Defines the child content

member.summary: Defines the field name of the filter column.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridFilterColumn.IgnoreAccent
member.summary: If ignoreAccent is set to true, then filter ignores the diacritic characters or accents while filtering.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridFilterColumn.MatchCase
member.summary: If match case set to true, then filter records with exact match or else filter records with case insensitive(uppercase and lowercase letters treated as same).

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridFilterColumn.Operator
member.summary: Defines the operator to filter records.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridFilterColumn.Predicate
member.summary: Defines the relationship between one filter query and another by using AND or OR predicate.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridFilterColumn.Uid
member.summary: Defines the UID of filter column.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridFilterColumn.Value
member.summary: Defines the value used to filter records.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridFilterColumn.ActualValue
member.summary: Defines the Actual value used to filter records.

member.summary: Configures grid filter columns

member.summary: Defines the parent component

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridFilterColumns.ChildContent
member.summary: Defines the child content

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridFilterColumns.Columns

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridFilterSettings
member.summary: Configures grid filtering

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridFilterSettings.MainParent
member.summary: Defines the parent component

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridFilterSettings.ChildContent
member.summary: Defines the child content

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridFilterSettings.Columns
member.summary: Specifies the columns to be filtered at initial rendering of the Grid. You can also get the columns that were currently filtered.
member.remarks: Use component to define filter criteria.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridFilterSettings.EnableCaseSensitivity
member.summary: If EnableCaseSensitivity is set to true then searches grid records with exact match based on the filter operator. It will have no effect on number, boolean and Date fields.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridFilterSettings.IgnoreAccent
member.summary: If ignoreAccent set to true, then filter ignores the diacritic characters or accents while filtering.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridFilterSettings.ImmediateModeDelay
member.summary: Defines the time delay (in milliseconds) in filtering records when the Immediate mode of filter bar is set.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridFilterSettings.Mode
member.summary:
Defines the filter bar modes. The available options are
OnEnter Initiate filter operation after Enter key is pressed.
Immediate Initiate filter operation after certain time interval. By default time interval is 1500ms.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridFilterSettings.Operators
member.summary: The Operators is used to override the default operators in filter menu. This should be defined by type wise (string, number, date and boolean). Based on the column type, this customize operator list will render in filter menu.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridFilterSettings.ShowFilterBarStatus
member.summary: Shows or hides the filtered status message on the pager.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridFilterSettings.Type
member.summary:
Defines options for filtering type. The available options are
FilterBar Default. Specifies the filter type as filter bar.
Menu Specifies the filter type as menu.
CheckBox Specifies the filter type as check box.
Excel Specifies the filter type as excel.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridGroupSettings
member.summary: Configures grid grouping

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridGroupSettings.MainParent
member.summary: Defines the parent component

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridGroupSettings.ChildContent
member.summary: Defines the child content

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridGroupSettings.AllowReordering
member.summary: If AllowReordering is set to true, Grid allows the grouped elements to be reordered.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridGroupSettings.CaptionTemplate
member.summary: The Caption Template allows user to display custom group caption.
member.remarks: The parameters passed to the templates can be accessed using implicit parameter named context. The context is of type of the grid.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridGroupSettings.Columns
member.summary: Specifies the column names to group at initial rendering of the Grid. You can also get the currently grouped columns.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridGroupSettings.DisablePageWiseAggregates
member.summary: If DisablePageWiseAggregates set to true, then the group aggregate value will be calculated from the whole data instead of paged data and two requests will be made for each page when Grid bound with remote service.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridGroupSettings.ShowDropArea
member.summary: If ShowDropArea is set to true, the group drop area element will be visible at the top of the Grid.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridGroupSettings.ShowGroupedColumn
member.summary: If ShowGroupedColumn is set to false, it hides the grouped column after grouping.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridGroupSettings.ShowToggleButton
member.summary: If ShowToggleButton set to true, then the toggle button will be showed in the column headers which can be used to group or ungroup columns by clicking them.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridGroupSettings.ShowUngroupButton
member.summary: If ShowUngroupButton set to false, then ungroup button is hidden in dropped element. It can be used to ungroup the grouped column when click on ungroup button.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridKeySettings
member.summary: Configures keyboard navigation for grid

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridKeySettings.MainParent
member.summary: Defines the parent component

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridKeySettings.MoveLeftCell
member.summary:
Defines the action keys for the left cell movement.
ShiftTab Moves to left cell on pressing Shift+Tab key
ArrowLeft Moves to left cell on pressing left arrow key
ShiftLeft Moves to left cell on pressing shift+left arrow key

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridKeySettings.MoveRightCell
member.summary:
Defines the action keys for the right cell movement.
Tab Moves to right cell on pressing Tab key
ArrowRight Moves to right cell on pressing right arrow key
ShiftRight Moves to right cell on pressing shift+right arrow key

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridKeySettings.MoveUpCell
member.summary:
Defines the action keys for the up cell movement.
ShiftEnter Moves to top cell on pressing Shit+Enter key
ArrowUp Moves to top cell on pressing up arrow key
ShiftUp Moves to top cell on pressing shift+up arrow key

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridKeySettings.MoveDownCell
member.summary:
Defines the action keys for the down cell movement.
Enter Moves to down cell on pressing Enter key
ArrowDown Moves to down cell on pressing down arrow key
ShiftDown Moves to down cell on pressing shift+down arrow key

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridPageSettings

member.summary: Defines the parent component

member.summary: Defines the child content

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridPageSettings.CurrentPage
member.summary: Defines the current page number of the pager.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridPageSettings.EnableQueryString
member.summary: If EnableQueryString set to true, then it pass current page information as a query string along with the URL while navigating to other page.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridPageSettings.PageCount
member.summary: Defines the number of pages to be displayed in the pager container.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridPageSettings.PageSize
member.summary: Defines the number of records to be displayed per page.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridPageSettings.PageSizes
member.summary: If PageSizes set to true or Array of values, It renders DropDownList in the pager which allow us to select pageSize from DropDownList.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridPageSettings.Template
member.summary:
Defines the template which renders customized elements in pager instead of default elements.
The parameters passed to the templates can be accessed using implicit parameter named context. The context is of type of the grid.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridPageSettings.EnableExternalMessage
member.summary: Enable or disable the ExternalMessage

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridPageSettings.ExternalMessage
member.summary: Defines the pager External message

member.summary: Defines the parent component

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridRowDropSettings.TargetID
member.summary: Defines the ID of droppable component on which row drop should occur.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridSearchSettings
member.summary: Configures grid searching

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridSearchSettings.MainParent
member.summary: Defines the parent component

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridSearchSettings.Fields
member.summary: Specifies the collection of fields included in search operation. By default, bounded columns of the Grid are included.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridSearchSettings.IgnoreAccent
member.summary: If ignoreAccent set to true, then filter ignores the diacritic characters or accents while filtering.
member.remarks: Ignore accent is supported by remote data alone. IgnoreAccent key will be sent to server and operation should be handled at user level.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridSearchSettings.IgnoreCase
member.summary: If IgnoreCase is set to false, searches records that match exactly, else searches records that are case insensitive(uppercase and lowercase letters treated the same).

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridSearchSettings.Key
member.summary: Specifies the key value to search Grid records at initial rendering. You can also get the current search key.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridSearchSettings.Operator
member.summary: Defines the operator to search records.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridSelectionSettings
member.summary: Configures grid selection

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridSelectionSettings.MainParent
member.summary: Defines the parent component

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridSelectionSettings.CellSelectionMode
member.summary:
The cell selection modes are flow and box. It requires the to be either cell or both.
Flow Default. Selects the range of cells between start index and end index that also includes the other cells of the selected rows..
Box Selects the range of cells within the start and end column indexes that includes in between cells of rows within the range

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridSelectionSettings.CheckboxMode
member.summary:
Defines options for checkbox selection Mode. They are,
Default Default. In this mode, user can select multiple rows by clicking rows one by one.
ResetOnRowClick In ResetOnRowClick mode, on clicking a row it will reset previously selected row and also multiple rows can be selected by using CTRL or SHIFT key.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridSelectionSettings.CheckboxOnly
member.summary: If CheckboxOnly set to true, then the Grid selection is allowed only through checkbox.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridSelectionSettings.EnableSimpleMultiRowSelection
member.summary: If EnableSimpleMultiRowSelection set to true, then the user can able to perform multiple row selection with single clicks.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridSelectionSettings.EnableToggle
member.summary: If EnableToggle set to true, then the user can able to perform toggle for the selected row.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridSelectionSettings.Mode
member.summary:
Specifies the selection mode. Available modes are,
Row Default. Row selection is enabled
Cell Cell selection is enabled.
Both Both Row and Cell selection is enabled.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridSelectionSettings.PersistSelection
member.summary: If PersistSelection set to true, then the Grid selection is persisted on all operations. For persisting selection in the Grid, any one of the column must be enabled as a primary key.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridSelectionSettings.Type
member.summary:
Defines options for selection type. They are
Single Default. Allows selection of only a row or a cell.
Multiple Allows user to select a multiple rows or cells.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridTemplates.DetailTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets the template to customize detail row element.
member.remarks: Use DetailTemplate to render hierarchy grid. It supports N level of nested grids. The parameters passed to the templates can be accessed using implicit parameter named context. The context is of type TValue.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridTemplates.EmptyRecordTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets the template to customize empty grid row element.
member.remarks: The parameters passed to the templates can be accessed using implicit parameter named context. The context is of type .

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridTemplates.ToolbarTemplate
member.summary: Render custom toolbar using ToolbarTemplate property. It replaces the in-built toolbar and click actions must be handled in custom toolbar itself.
member.remarks: The parameters passed to the templates can be accessed using implicit parameter named context.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.SfGrid`1
member.summary: Blazor Grid component displays tabular data and it has in-built support for various data binding, editing, sorting and filtering.
member.typeparam: A type which provides schema for the grid component.
member.remarks: TValue is inferred from value of DataSource property if it is bounded with IEnumerable. If data is consumed using SfDataManager then TValue must be assigned explicitly.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.SfGrid`1.UnMatchedAttributes
member.summary: Catches unmatched attributes from the component. This can be used to specify custom style, class and other attributes to the grid.

member.summary: CurrentViewData provides the current data details binded in the grid.

member.summary: TotalItemCount provides the total record count in the data source.

member.summary: Specifies whether grid is in edit state or not.

member.summary: Specifies the grid events.

member.summary: Gets the selected records of the grid.
member.remarks: When selection persistence feature is enabled then it returns records in other pages too

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.SfGrid`1.SelectedRowIndexes
member.summary: Gets the selected record`s indexes of the grid.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.SfGrid`1.ForceUpdate
member.summary: If ForceUpdate is set to true then it will immediately render the grid component.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.SfGrid`1.IsCollectionChanged
member.summary: If IsCollectionChanged is set to true then it will allow observableCollection data to make change in GridContent.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.SfGrid`1.PreventRender(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Prevents the grid render. This method will internally sets value to be returned from ShouldRender method.
member.param: Default value is true. Toggles the ShouldRender method value.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.SfGrid`1.SetPersistData(System.String)
member.summary: Load the previously saved state of the Grid.
member.param: Contains the saved properties as string value
member.remarks: This method is primarly used to load and refresh the grid with already saved state. The state can be served from any source such as window.localStorage, DB etc.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.SfGrid`1.ResetPersistData
member.summary: Resets the state of the Grid.
member.remarks: This method will clear the current state and refreshes the grid with original state given delcaratively. If EnablePersistence is used then this will clear the state which is stored in window.localStorage too.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.SfGrid`1.PersistProperties(System.String)
member.summary: Defines the properties of persisting component’s state between page reloads.

member.summary: Handles dispose component.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.SfGrid`1.ChildContent
member.summary: Defines the child content

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.SfGrid`1.Aggregates
member.summary: Gets the Grid aggregate rows. Use component to configure aggregate rows.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.SfGrid`1.AllowExcelExport
member.summary: If AllowExcelExport set to true, then it will allow the user to export grid to Excel file.
member.remarks: To perform excel export, bind event and invoke method in its toolbar item click handler.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.SfGrid`1.AllowFiltering
member.summary: If AllowFiltering set to true the filter bar will be displayed for all columns. If set to false the filter bar will not be displayed. Filter bar allows the user to filter grid records with required criteria.
member.remarks: Filter type can be changed from filterbar using property. Filter can be disabled for particular column by using .

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.SfGrid`1.AllowGrouping
member.summary: If AllowGrouping set to true, then it will allow the user to dynamically group or ungroup columns. Grouping can be done by drag and drop columns from column header to group drop area.
member.remarks: Grouping can be further configured using component.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.SfGrid`1.AllowMultiSorting
member.summary: If AllowMultiSorting set to true, then it will allow the user to sort multiple column in the grid.
member.remarks: must be true to use this property. Sorting can be further configured using component.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.SfGrid`1.AllowPaging
member.summary: If AllowPaging is set to true, the pager renders at the footer of the Grid. It is used to handle page navigation in the Grid.
member.remarks: Paging can be further configured using component.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.SfGrid`1.AllowPdfExport
member.summary: If AllowPdfExport set to true, then it will allow the user to export grid to Pdf file.
member.remarks: To perform pdf export, bind event and invoke method in its toolbar item click handler.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.SfGrid`1.AllowReordering
member.summary: If AllowReordering is set to true, Grid columns can be reordered. Reordering can be done by drag and drop of a particular column from one index to another index.
member.remarks: If Grid is rendered with stacked headers, reordering is allowed only at the same level as the column headers.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.SfGrid`1.AllowResizing
member.summary: If AllowResizing is set to true, Grid columns can be resized.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.SfGrid`1.AllowRowDragAndDrop
member.summary: If AllowRowDragAndDrop is set to true, you can drag and drop grid rows at another or within grid.
member.remarks: To drag and drop rows between grids or to another component, property should be provided with the ID of the target grid or any other component.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.SfGrid`1.AllowSelection
member.summary: If AllowSelection is set to true, it allows selection of (highlight row) Grid records by clicking it.
member.remarks: Selection can be further configured using component.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.SfGrid`1.AllowSorting
member.summary: If AllowSorting is set to true, it allows sorting of grid records when column header is clicked.
member.remarks: Sorting can be further configured using component.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.SfGrid`1.AllowTextWrap
member.summary: If AllowTextWrap set to true, then text content will wrap to the next line when its text content exceeds the width of the Column Cells.
member.remarks: Text wrap can be further configured using component.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.SfGrid`1.ChildGrid
member.summary: Defines Grid options to render child Grid.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.SfGrid`1.ClipMode
member.summary:
Defines the mode of clip. The available modes are,
Clip Truncates the cell content when it overflows its area.
Ellipsis Displays ellipsis when the cell content overflows its area.
EllipsisWithTooltip Displays ellipsis when the cell content overflows its area also it will display tooltip while hover on ellipsis applied cell.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.SfGrid`1.ColumnChooserSettings
member.summary: Configures the column chooser in the Grid.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.SfGrid`1.KeySettings
member.summary: Configures the cell movement keys in the Grid.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.SfGrid`1.ColumnMenuItems
member.summary:
ColumnMenuItems defines both built-in and custom column menu items.
The available built-in items are, AutoFitAll - Auto fit the size of all columns. AutoFit - Auto fit the current column. Group - Group by current column. Ungroup - Ungroup by current column. SortAscending - Sort the current column in ascending order. SortDescending - Sort the current column in descending order. Filter - Filter options will show based on filterSettings property like checkbox filter, excel filter, menu filter.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.SfGrid`1.ColumnQueryMode
member.summary:
ColumnQueryModeprovides options to retrive data from the datasource.
All It retrives whole data source
Schema Retrives data for all the defined columns in grid from the data source.
ExcludeHidden Retrives data only for visible columns of grid from the data source.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.SfGrid`1.Columns
member.summary: Defines the schema of data source. Use to add grid columns. If the Columns declaration is empty or undefined then the columns are automatically generated from data source.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.SfGrid`1.ContextMenuItems
member.summary:
ContextMenuItems defines both built-in and custom context menu items.
The available built-in items are, AutoFitAll - Auto fit the size of all columns. AutoFit - Auto fit the current column. Group - Group by current column. Ungroup - Ungroup by current column. Edit - Edit the current record. Delete - Delete the current record. Save - Save the edited record. Cancel - Cancel the edited state. Copy - Copy the selected records. PdfExport - Export the grid as Pdf format. ExcelExport - Export the grid as Excel format. CsvExport - Export the grid as CSV format. SortAscending - Sort the current column in ascending order. SortDescending - Sort the current column in descending order. FirstPage - Go to the first page. PrevPage - Go to the previous page. LastPage - Go to the last page. NextPage - Go to the next page.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.SfGrid`1.CurrentAction
member.summary: Gets or sets the current action details.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.SfGrid`1.DataSource
member.summary: Provides the data source for rendering grid rows. The data source value can be of any type that implements IEnumerable.
member.remarks: To consume data from remote service or custom adaptor, component has to be used.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.SfGrid`1.DataSourceChanged
member.summary: Invokes when data source changes.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.SfGrid`1.DetailTemplate
member.summary: The detail template allows you to show or hide additional information about a particular row.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.SfGrid`1.EditSettings
member.summary: Configures the edit settings.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.SfGrid`1.EnableAltRow
member.summary: If EnableAltRow is set to true, the grid will render with e-altrow CSS class to the alternative tr elements.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.SfGrid`1.EnableAutoFill
member.summary: If EnableAutoFill is set to true, then the auto fill icon will displayed on cell selection for copy cells. It requires the selection mode to be Cell and CellSelectionMode to be Box.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.SfGrid`1.EnableColumnVirtualization
member.summary: If EnableColumnVirtualization set to true, then the Grid will render only the columns visible within the view-port and load subsequent columns on horizontal scrolling. This helps to load large dataset of columns in Grid.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.SfGrid`1.EnableHeaderFocus
member.summary: If EnableHeaderFocus set to true, then header element will be focused when focus moves to grid.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.SfGrid`1.EnableVirtualMaskRow
member.summary: If EnableMastRow set to true the Masked row append in the DOM elements. If set to false default virtual scrolling will work while enabling Enable Virtualization. In this feature Masked cells displayed until data cells retrieve.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.SfGrid`1.EnableHover
member.summary: If EnableHover is set to true, the row hover is enabled in the Grid.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.SfGrid`1.EnablePersistence
member.summary: Enable or disable persisting component's state between page reloads.
member.remarks: Enabling this property will store the grid state such as column order, column width, sort information etc in the window.localStorage when the component is disposed. Users can also store grid state in data base instead of window.localStorage by using method.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.SfGrid`1.EnableRtl
member.summary: Enable or disable rendering component in right to left direction.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.SfGrid`1.EnableVirtualization
member.summary: If EnableVirtualization set to true, then the Grid will render only the rows visible within the view-port and load subsequent rows on vertical scrolling. This helps to load large dataset in Grid.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.SfGrid`1.FilterSettings
member.summary: Configures the filter settings of the Grid.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.SfGrid`1.FrozenColumns
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of frozen columns.
member.remarks: Specific column can be frozen using property.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.SfGrid`1.FrozenRows
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of frozen rows.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.SfGrid`1.GridLines
member.summary:
Defines the mode of grid lines. The available modes are,
Both Displays both the horizontal and vertical grid lines.
None No grid lines are displayed.
Horizontal Displays the horizontal grid lines only.
Vertical Displays grid lines based on the theme.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.SfGrid`1.GroupSettings
member.summary: Configures the group settings.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.SfGrid`1.Height
member.summary: Defines the scrollable height of the grid content.
member.remarks: Height can be assigned with pixel and percentage values such as 100px, 100% etc.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.SfGrid`1.HierarchyPrintMode
member.summary:
Defines the hierarchy grid print modes. The available modes are
Expanded Prints the master grid with expanded child grids.
All Prints the master grid with all the child grids.
None Prints the master grid alone.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.Internal.SfInputBase.Autocomplete
member.summary:
Specifies whether the browser is allowed to automatically enter or select a value for the TextBox.
By default, autocomplete is enabled for TextBox.
Possible values are:
On Specifies that autocomplete is enabled
Off Specifies that autocomplete is disabled.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.Internal.SfInputBase.CssClass
member.summary: Specifies the CSS class name that can be appended with the root element of the TextBox. One or more custom CSS classes can be added to a TextBox.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.Internal.SfInputBase.EnablePersistence
member.summary: Enable or disable the persisting TextBox state between page reloads. If enabled, the `Value` state will be persisted.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.Internal.SfInputBase.EnableRtl
member.summary: Enable or disable rendering component in the right to left direction.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.Internal.SfInputBase.Enabled
member.summary: Specifies a boolean value that indicates whether the TextBox allows the user to interact with it.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.Internal.SfInputBase.FloatLabelType
member.summary:
Specifies the floating label behavior of the TextBox that the placeholder text floats above the TextBox based on the following values.
Possible values are:
Never Never floats the label in the TextBox when the placeholder is available.
Always The floating label always floats above the TextBox.
Auto The floating label floats above the TextBox after focusing it or when enters the value in it.
